itunes:title: Episode 592 - Special Guest The Millennial Farmer
title: Episode 592 - Special Guest The Millennial Farmer

itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Youtuber The Millennial Farmer to discuss misconceptions about the farming industry that people mistake, what a day is like in the life of a farmer, how the coronavirus has devastated livestock, why s...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Youtuber The Millennial Farmer to discuss misconceptions about the farming industry that people mistake, what a day is like in the life of a farmer, how the coronavirus has devastated livestock, why small farms may be out of business soon, is farmersonly.com really a trend amongst farmers, and discuss how hemp farming has really caught on in the US.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Youtuber The Millennial Farmer to discuss misconceptions about the farming industry that people mistake, what a day is like in the life of a farmer, how the coronavirus has devastated livestock, why small farms may be out of business soon, is farmersonly.com really a trend amongst farmers, and discuss how hemp farming has really caught on in the US.
